title: Personal Portfolio
description: BharathCodes is a sleek, interactive website crafted with React, styled with CSS and bootstraped with Vite for lightning-fast performance. Dive in to explore my work, discover my expertise, and connect with me effortlessly.

title: Memories Book
description: Built with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, it blends elegant frontend design with robust backend functionality. It's a platform for storytelling and community bonding through shared experiences of places that matter. Discover hidden gems and celebrate the diversity of our world, one place at a time.

title: Mini-Database System
description: NITCBase, relational database management system. Designed to store data and perform queries using SQL-like commands. The entire codebase was meticulously implemented in C++, adhering to industry-standard programming practices.

title: Gamers Guild
description: GamersGuild is a dynamic and interactive web application designed to help users discover and explore new games. Built using the powerful front-end technologies of React and Tailwind CSS, GamersGuild offers a sleek, responsive, and user-friendly interface that enhances the gaming discovery experience.

title: Paper-Conference
description: NITCONF is a paper conference website application. A full stack web application(REST APIs) built as part of my academic course. Developed with HTML, CSS, Javascript, spring boot, spring Data JPA, spring security, and MySQL.
